lead_paragraph: That coach Russell Domingo was forced to field a question about the captaincy of the South Africa team in the wake of the Adelaide day-night test was testimony to the impact Faf du Plessis had on the series.

headline.print_headline: Du Plessis Is South Africa's Hero, Australia's Villain
headline.main: Du Plessis Is South Africa's Hero, Australia's Villain

snippet: That coach Russell Domingo was forced to field a question about the captaincy of the South Africa team in the wake of the Adelaide day-night test was testimony to the impact Faf du Plessis had on the series....
